headline: UBS Downgrades Gartner, Inc. (IT) to ‘Hold’, Cites Sluggish Growth in Fundamental Client Value
summary: Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT) is one of the 12 Best Stocks to Buy in Falling Markets According to Hedge Funds. On August 6, 2025, UBS analyst Joshua Chan downgraded Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT) to ‘Hold’ with a price target of $270, citing sluggish growth in the company’s fundamental client value (CV) indicators. Q2 results were severely below […]
